item.text: He also came to Derbe and to Lystra. A disciple named Timothy was there, the son of a Jewish woman who was a believer, but whose father was a Greek.

The <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3082" class="">Lystra</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2430" class="">Iconium</st> <st data-num="3140">spoke well</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3739">him</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">Timothy</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1831 4862">accompany</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcised</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">places</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they <st data-num="537" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="5225" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1672" class="">Greek</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="5613" class="">As</st> they <st data-num="1279" class="">went through</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">towns</st>,<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="3860">passed on</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1378" class="">decrees</st> that had been <st data-num="2919">decided on</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="3" /> for <st data-num="846">the Gentile believers</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="5442" class="">obey</st>.<n id="5" />
So the churches were being strengthened in the faith and were increasing in number every day.
They went through the region of Phrygia and Galatia, having been prevented by the Holy Spirit from speaking the message in the province of Asia.

When they <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">to</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3465" class="">Mysia</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="3985" class="">attempted</st> to <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="978" class="">Bithynia</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1439" class="">allow</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to do this,<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">so</st> they <st data-num="3928">passed through</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3465" class="">Mysia</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="2597">went down</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5174" class="">Troas</st>.<n id="3" />

A<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3705" class="">vision</st> <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> to <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">during</st> the <st data-num="3571" class="">night:</st> <st data-num="5100">A</st> <st data-num="3110" class="">Macedonian</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> there<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3870" class="">urging</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="1224">Come over</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st><n id="5" /> and <st data-num="997" class="">help</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>!”
After Paul saw the vision, we attempted immediately to go over to Macedonia, concluding that God had called us to proclaim the good news to them.
We put out to sea from Troas and sailed a straight course to Samothrace, the next day to Neapolis,

and <st data-num="2547">from there</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5375" class="">Philippi</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3748" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="4413" class="">leading</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> of that <st data-num="3310" class="">district</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st>,<n id="3" /> a Roman <st data-num="2862" class="">colony</st>.<n id="4" /> We <st data-num="1304" class="">stayed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> for <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>.

On the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> we <st data-num="1831" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> the city <st data-num="4439">gate</st> to the <st data-num="3844" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="4215" class="">river</st>, <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> we <st data-num="3543" class="">thought</st> there would <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="4335">place of prayer</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="2523">sat down</st><n id="1" /> and began to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st><n id="3" /> who had <st data-num="4905" class="">assembled</st> there.<n id="4" />

A<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="3070" class="">Lydia</st>, a <st data-num="4211">dealer in purple cloth</st><n id="2" /> from the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="2363" class="">Thyatira</st>,<n id="3" /> a <st data-num="2316">God</st>-<st data-num="4576" class="">fearing</st> woman, <st data-num="191" class="">listened</st> to us.<n id="4" /> The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1272" class="">opened</st> her <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4337" class="">respond</st><n id="5" /> to what <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> was <st data-num="2980" class="">saying</st>.
After she and her household were baptized, she urged us, “If you consider me to be a believer in the Lord, come and stay in my house.” And she persuaded us.

Now as we were going to the place of prayer, a slave girl met us who had a spirit that enabled her to foretell the future by supernatural means. She brought her owners a great profit by fortune-telling.

<st data-num="3778" class="">She</st> <st data-num="2628">followed behind</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> and kept <st data-num="2896">crying out</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">servants</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="5310">Most High</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> are <st data-num="2605" class="">proclaiming</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st>.”<n id="4" />

She continued to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> became <st data-num="1278">greatly annoyed</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1994" class="">turned</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to the <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>, “I <st data-num="3853" class="">command</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1831" class="">come out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> it <st data-num="1831">came out</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5610">at once</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">owners</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> of <st data-num="2039" class="">profit</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="1831" class="">gone</st>, they <st data-num="1949" class="">seized</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4609" class="">Silas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1670" class="">dragged</st><n id="4" /> them <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="58">marketplace</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="758" class="">authorities</st>.

When<n id="1" /> they had <st data-num="4317" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="2" /> before the <st data-num="4755" class="">magistrates</st>, they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3778">These</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st> are <st data-num="1613" class="">throwing</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> into <st data-num="1613" class="">confusion</st>.<n id="3" /> They <st data-num="5225" class="">are</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>
and are advocating customs that are not lawful for us to accept or practice, since we are Romans.”
The crowd joined the attack against them, and the magistrates tore the clothes off Paul and Silas and ordered them to be beaten with rods.

After they had <st data-num="2007 4127">beaten</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">severely</st>,<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="906" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> and <st data-num="3853" class="">commanded</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1200" class="">jailer</st> to <st data-num="5083" class="">guard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="806" class="">securely</st>.
Receiving such orders, he threw them in the inner cell and fastened their feet in the stocks.
About midnight Paul and Silas were praying and singing hymns to God, and the rest of the prisoners were listening to them.

<st data-num="869" class="">Suddenly</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4578" class="">earthquake</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">occurred</st>, <st data-num="5620">so that</st> the <st data-num="2310" class="">foundations</st> of the <st data-num="1201" class="">prison</st> were <st data-num="4531" class="">shaken</st>. <st data-num="3916" class="">Immediately</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">doors</st> <st data-num="455">flew open</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1199" class="">bonds</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the prisoners came <st data-num="447" class="">loose</st>.

When the <st data-num="1200" class="">jailer</st> <st data-num="1853">woke up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">doors</st> of the <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="455">standing open</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="4685" class="">drew</st> his <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="337" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st><n id="3" /> because he <st data-num="3543" class="">assumed</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="1198" class="">prisoners</st> had <st data-num="1628" class="">escaped</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="5455" class="">called out</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">loudly</st>,<n id="1" /> “Do <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">harm</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="537" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1759" class="">here</st>!”

<st data-num="154" class="">Calling</st> for <st data-num="5457" class="">lights</st>, the jailer<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1530">rushed in</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4363" class="">fell down</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1790" class="">trembling</st> <st data-num="4363">at the feet</st> of <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4609" class="">Silas</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="4254" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="5346" class="">asked</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Sirs</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>?”

<st data-num="3588">They</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4100">Believe</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>, you <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of the <st data-num="2316" class="">Lord</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="4862">along with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> those who were <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">At</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> of the <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> he <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3068" class="">washed</st> their <st data-num="4127">wounds</st>;<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956">all</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> family<n id="5" /> were <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="3916">right away</st>.<n id="6" />

The jailer<n id="1" /> <st data-num="321" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> his <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> and <st data-num="3908" class="">set</st> <st data-num="5132" class="">food</st><n id="2" /> before them, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="21">rejoiced greatly</st><n id="3" /> that he had come to <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st><n id="4" /> in <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, together with his <st data-num="3832">entire household</st>.<n id="5" />

At <st data-num="2250" class="">daybreak</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4755" class="">magistrates</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> their <st data-num="4465">police officers</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="630">Release</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st>.”

The <st data-num="1200" class="">jailer</st> <st data-num="518" class="">reported</st> <st data-num="3778">these</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>, saying,<n id="1" /> “The <st data-num="4755" class="">magistrates</st> have <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> orders<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> you. <st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1831">come out</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> and <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">police officers</st>,<n id="1" /> “They had <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1194" class="">beaten</st> in <st data-num="1219" class="">public</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="178" class="">without a proper trial</st><n id="3" />—even though we <st data-num="5225">are</st> <st data-num="4514">Roman citizens</st><n id="4" />—and they <st data-num="906" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> they want to <st data-num="1544" class="">send</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">away</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="2977" class="">secretly</st>? <st data-num="235">Absolutely</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>! They<n id="7" /> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st> must <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="1806" class="">escort</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1806" class="">out</st>!”<n id="8" />

The <st data-num="4465">police officers</st> <st data-num="518" class="">reported</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> to the <st data-num="4755" class="">magistrates</st>. They were <st data-num="5399" class="">frightened</st> when they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> Paul and Silas<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4514">Roman citizens</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="3870" class="">apologized</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. After<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="1806" class="">brought</st> them <st data-num="1806" class="">out</st>, they <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> them repeatedly<n id="3" /> to <st data-num="565" class="">leave</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>.
When they came out of the prison, they entered Lydia’s house, and when they saw the brothers, they encouraged them and then departed.
